list_definition.definition: the part of the body between the head and chest

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She wore a scarf around her neck.

list_definition.definition: the part of an article of clothing that covers that part of the body

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The neck of that shirt is dirty.

list_definition.definition: anything like a neck in shape or position
to kiss, hug and caress (passionately); to pet

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They were necking on a park bench.
